description: This file is the main source file for a Flutter application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with custom styling and game logic. It includes theme setup, the main app widget, game state management, and the game UI components such as the game board, cells, and status displays.

classes.name: OceanColors
classes.description: Defines custom color palette constants for the application's theme.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up Material 3 theme and handling app initialization.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: Manages the game board state, current player, winner, draw status, and game logic.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Main game UI with app bar, status display, game board, and restart button.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the 3x3 grid of game cells and managing grid interactions.

classes.name: _Cell
classes.description: Widget representing individual cells with animations and tap handling.

classes.name: _KnightIcon
classes.description: Visual representation of the 'X' player, using a knight emoji with styling.

classes.name: _QueenIcon
classes.description: Visual representation of the 'O' player, using a queen emoji with styling.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter app, launching 'TicTacToeApp'.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Configures the app's ThemeData with custom colors, typography, and component styles.
